title: Trauma-Informed Healing
description: Understanding trauma, building safety, and reclaiming your life

questions.question: What is the primary goal of the stabilization phase in trauma recovery?
What does 'the window of tolerance' refer to?
options: How much trauma someone can experience
The optimal zone where we can process without overwhelm
The time it takes to recover from trauma
The number of triggers someone can handle

questions.question: Why is somatic awareness important in trauma healing?
options: Trauma is primarily a thinking problem
The body stores trauma that the mind may not remember

subtitle: Safety first, healing follows
